channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- iQ Block Country
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- iQ Block Country

item.title: CVE-2022-1762|2024-08-03T00:16:59.806Z -- unknown -- iq%20block%20country
item.description: The iQ Block Country WordPress plugin before 1.2.20 does not properly checks HTTP headers in order to validate the origin IP address, allowing threat actors to bypass it's block feature by spoofing the headers.
